titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 333) to amend title 11, United States Code, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-781, by Mr. Sessions.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 333.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 238.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 606.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 172 - 243 (Roll no. 478).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/13/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R.333 (bankruptcy law and consumer credit reform).
